Generation IX.Scarlet: After all its muscles were stimulated by the toxic chain around its neck, Okidogi transformed and gained a powerful physique.
Generation IX.Violet: Okidogi is a ruffian with a short temper. It can pulverize anything by swinging around the chain on its neck.

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Paradise Barrens (after completing the main story of The Teal Mask ; only one )
